attributes.action: I have been looking for a job but they wont hire me fo anything.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hiya my name is Georgia Murray and I am 12 years old and I think that people under 15 years old should be able to get a job if they won't to beause some familys are not rich and need all the money they get for food and clothes ect I really need a job to support my family but I don't won't to do a paper round so is there enything you can do for children to support there familys ?

rejection.details:
Dear Georgia,

It sounds like you are trying to write a letter to the Prime Minister rather than create a petition. You can find out how to write to or email the Prime Minister on this page: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
